localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: It's easy to forget to take time out of your day for mindfulness and meditation. The Silent Podcast is an automated podcast feed that provides a daily 10-minute pocket of quiet and stillness in your routine.
nodes.title: The Silent Podcast - A daily 10 minutes pocket of stillness in your podcast feed
nodes.author: Gabriel Krieshok

nodes.excerpt: WebiCaster is a new professional network for English and Spanish podcasters, it's the easiest way to discover amazing people who want to be part of your podcast. We make it easy for you to find a guest for your interviews or a co-host to create a new podcast.
nodes.title: WebiCaster - Free Professional network for podcasters
nodes.author: Robert Menetray

nodes.excerpt: Seedr simplifies the way you get stuff, stream and access it.
nodes.title: Seedr - Paste any website link, download & stream on your device
nodes.author: bob sadino

nodes.excerpt: They say don't judge a book by its cover... What about movies? uFlix takes movie nights and turns the decision process into an enjoyable social experience to have with friends, family or partners!
nodes.title: uFlix - Choose what to watch in a hassle free manner
nodes.author: James Jones

nodes.excerpt: https://pry.co helps founders and makers manage their finances. Instead of using Excel, Founders and business owners can use Pry to manage their budget, expenses, hiring plan, and cash runway.
nodes.title: Pry - Finance for founders and makers
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Whether you're a maker, content creator, freelancer, indie hacker, influencer, or thought leader, The Creator System will help you stay organised and on track. You no longer need to rely solely on your motivation or inspiration to get things done.
nodes.title: The Creator System - Be organised, stay productive and produce outcomes in Notion
nodes.author: Isabel Nyo

nodes.excerpt: Tally is a new type of form builder. Just start typing and build forms for all purposes in seconds. Without knowing how to code, and for free!
nodes.title: Tally - The simplest way to create forms for free
nodes.author: Filip Minev

nodes.excerpt: Our browser-based plug-in lets you build Excel import automation processes in less than 10 minutes. No code required. And the tool works in any online business system.
nodes.title: Cognifirm - Automated Excel import into any online business system
nodes.author: Per Damgaard

nodes.excerpt: Kbee transforms Google Drive folders into a searchable wiki for you, your team, or your customers.
nodes.title: Kbee - Turn Google Drive into a wiki or help center
nodes.author: Sandeep Dinesh

nodes.excerpt: Focus on what matters, from small tasks to life goals: - Spend your time doing things and reaching your goals - Stop wasting your time classifying things or measuring productivity. Minimalist and delightful design. No sign up. No ads. No data collected.
nodes.title: Listed - The minimalist app for your to-dos & notes
nodes.author: FranÃ§ois Goldgewicht

nodes.excerpt: A comprehensive tool for ensuring that Applicant Tracking Systems (ATSs) and other automatic filtering systems can accurately read you CV and extract text from it. Your CV will only progress to a human reviewer if a machine can read it properly.
nodes.title: e-Read My CV - Test if machine can parse your CV and read its content
nodes.author: Vlad  Grossman

nodes.excerpt: Litmaps lets you navigate the scientific literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks. Create a literature map, discover new articles, and export your discoveries, to advance your research project.
nodes.title: Litmaps - Search scientific literature with interactive citations map
nodes.author: Axton Pitt

nodes.excerpt: Keka wants to be an easy to use little app, well integrated in macOS and very powerful. And it is. You can compress files in all common (and not that common) formats and uncompress almost every format file, with and without encryption.
nodes.title: Keka - The macOS file archiver
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: HelloScribe Guru can write a draft on just about any topic - in seconds. Automated writing for long-form content has never been faster, easier, or more convenient. Get off the blank page - say bye-bye writer's block!
nodes.title: HelloScribe Guru - Your AI-powered article writer - for real.
nodes.author: George Prendergast

nodes.excerpt: Yep, it's one of those stash services again. But I don't think there's been one focused only on resources to supercharge designers, entrepreneurs, founders, indie-makers, side-hustlers and anyone building digital products or services. Lifetime accessğŸ‰
nodes.title: Zupermaker - 1000+ tools & resources to grow and supercharge your skills

nodes.excerpt: Poser is a vector illustration pack that includes 20 unique illustrated poses that can be used to emphasize key features of your products and/or services. We have a 25% discount for Product Hunt buyers https://gumroad.com/l/YkhLs/poser-25-ph
nodes.title: Poser illustrations - Customizable illustrations for your projects
nodes.author: Greg Dlubacz

nodes.excerpt: WellBuddy is a smart wellbeing tool that makes it easy and simple to focus on your health at work. â € It integrates with your calendar and monitors and schedules physical and mental health breaks when youâ€™re free so you can think, feel and perform better.
nodes.title: WellBuddy - Helping you find time to focus on your wellbeing at work
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: This app is used for writing copy for marketing purposes, such as website content or blog posts. This copy can be customized and unique to each client and can be used immediately on your website. The app uses artificial intelligence (AI) to write amazing copy.
nodes.title: Exty Solutions - AI copywriting that writes everything for you within a click
nodes.author: Ian Dikhtiar

nodes.excerpt: I realized we don't have a lot of tools for a conversation-first culture. So, I deleted social media off of my phone and built this app. Whenever I am craving connection, I have it populate a random contact for me to text or call.
nodes.title: Out of the Blue - A roulette for your contacts
nodes.author: Brett Bejcek

nodes.excerpt: Lunatask is an all-in-one privacy-focused todo list, habit and mood tracker, and pomodoro timer. It remembers stuff for you and helps you prioritize what to work on next. Markdown and end-to-end encryption included ğŸš€
nodes.title: Lunatask - All-in-one todo list, habit tracker and pomodoro timer
nodes.author: Michal KrejÄÃ­

nodes.excerpt: Record videos from the camera or capture from the screen. Free screen and camera recorder. Capture unlimited videos. Available for Mac, Windows, Chrome and Edge browsers. More than 1 million individuals share billions of screen recordings using Scre.io
nodes.title: Scre.io - Record videos from the camera or capture from the screen
nodes.author: Luan Gjokaj

nodes.excerpt: Airdocs is a document generation service for Airtable. Create smart, beautiful-looking documents from your data. The drag-and-drop designer gives you ultimate control of your documents. Send your documents to another app or store them back in Airtable.
nodes.title: Airdocs - Generate documents from Airtable
nodes.author: Josh Mamroud

nodes.excerpt: Simple and fast website analytics that belong to you. Fully GDPR & CCPA & PECR compliant. No more annoying cookie banners! Created and hosted in Switzerland ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡­
nodes.title: Nilly Analytics - Privacy-first web analytics from Switzerland

nodes.excerpt: Mochi = Spaced repetition + Zettelkasten + Markdown
nodes.title: Mochi mobile - Take notes in markdown, study them with spaced repetition
nodes.author: Matt Steedman

nodes.excerpt: A place where you can find the best free virtual backgrounds for your video calls. You can use them on Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Skype, Google Meet, WebEx or any other apps with custom background features.
nodes.title: Virtual Backgrounds - Find the best free virtual backgrounds for your video calls
nodes.author: Pedro Marques Daniel
